title: Prince Harry Cocktail Recipe
full_text:
Prince Harry Cocktail Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Active
4 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
1 serving
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
Ice
3/4
ounce
dark rum
3/4
ounce
King's Ginger
1/2
ounce
freshly squeezed
lime juice
Dash
Angostura bitters
1
ounce
ginger beer
, or more to taste
Lime twist
for garnish
Directions
Fill a cocktail shaker with ice. Add rum, King's Ginger, lime juice, and Angostura. Shake well and strain into an ice-filled old fashioned glass. Top with ginger beer and garnish with lime twist.
Special equipment
Cocktail shaker and strainer
Rum
